description.value:
You adapt a creature to live among the trees, improving its ability to climb, balance, and leap. Target a willing creature within 30 feet. For 10 minutes, it gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed and a +1 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Balance] and Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.High Jump]. When it Leaps, it increases the distance it can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] horizontally by 5 feet and vertically by 2 feet. If you use Born to the Trees again, any existing one ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Born to the Trees]

Level (6th) You can target up to 5 willing creatures.
